controllers

Class RecipeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.RecipeController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRecipeController

    public class RecipeController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRecipeController
    The controller class for "Recept", it takes input from the API class, validates input and passes the data to the corresponding DAO class, when the DAO class saved/deleted/updated the data, the controller class returns a Response to the corresponding API.
